About.paragraph: is a company established to cater industry with various supplies, service as well as to provide with techically and economically effective solutions for the valued customer.
About.vision: to achieve sustainable growth; we have established a vision with clear goal to become the reliable supply chain partner to provide hight qualuty and affordable goods and services for our valued clients and industries
About.mission: is responsible to provide hight quality products and service through a wide range sourcing ability and value to be recognized as reliable supply-chain partner in the industries in local and global markets. It is our commietment to make conutnous Imporvement to enchance our ablity providing high quality products and service, to meet or exceed customer statisfaction and to achieve operational excellence and superior financial performance. at Sembada Perdana Insan, we have always shown our commitment to safety, environtment and scoiety by recoginizing and implementing good practice in ecouraging a culture of responsiblity in everything we do.
